es.prodevelop.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.jdbc.oracle
Class OracleSpatialFeatureIterator

java.lang.Object
  es.prodevelop.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.jdbc.oracle.OracleSpatialFeatureIterator
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.IFeatureIterator
public class OracleSpatialFeatureIterator
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.IFeatureIterator

Oracle feature iterator. An instance of this class is returned whaen gvSIG asks for a feature iterator for a new viewport.

Author:
jldominguez

Constructor.

Parameters:
parent - the driver that creates it
_rs - the result set to be iterated (already computed by the driver)
_st - the statement that generated the result set. The iterator will close it.
geoColIndex - index of the geometry field
_useGeotools - a switch to decide if the geotools classes must be used to deal with geometris
